stephane.analysis.average¶

Functions

ensemble_average(Mlist, i[, Dt])

Compute an ensemble average from a set of identical experiments

profile_1d(M[, Dt, direction, start, fignum])

Compute the 1d averaged profile> Averaging is performed along a Dt window in time, and along the specified axis, either 'v' or 'h' INPUT ----- M : Mdata object. Dt : int. Default 10 time windows width for the averaging direction : string. default 'v'. Only option now start : int starting index fignum : int number for the figure output OUTPUT ----- Ux,Uy,Ux_std,Uy_std.

time_average(M, i[, Dt])

Compute the profile averaged over time
